content.p: If you answer yes to any of the questions above then the Learning Centre Project team are here to support you. The Learning Centre @ UNMC is a project supported by UNMC’s Teaching and Learning Funding Scheme. Our role is to provide academic and study skills support to help you make the most of your time at the University of Nottingham Malaysia Campus. Our workshops and one-to-one sessions are designed to complement the support and advice that Schools and Departments provide throughout their courses. Please do check what is on offer in your School. We can help you with advice about the following ares of study: Find out about workshops and one-to-one support sessions Autumn Semester 15-16 (17 August – 19 December 2015) More information on the academic calendars including key dates Learning Centre consultations should be used to talk about writing for assignments, reports etc. This is not a proofreading service, nor should you expect to have your work done for you by the tutor. Centre for English Language Education (CELE) Well-being and Learning Support Teaching and Learning at UNMC Studying Effectively at The University of Nottingham UK.CN.MY (institutional site hosted in the UK) The University of Nottingham Quality Manual (institutional site hosted in the UK) telephone: +6 (03) 8924 8000 fax: +6 (03) 8924 8012
